Package it.polimi.se2019.view.cli

Class AsciiTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.view.cli.AsciiTile
  • class AsciiTile
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the drawing of a single tile, and its related info.

      • drawTile

        static void drawTile​(ViewTile tile,
                     int offsetX,
                     int offsetY)
        Draw the tile in the terminal
        Parameters:
        tile - to draw
        offsetX - to avoid overwriting in horizontal
        offsetY - to avoid overwriting in vertical

      • drawTileInfo

        static void drawTileInfo​(ViewTile tile,
                         int offsetX,
                         int offsetY)
        Display the info of the tile, and what it contains, such as:
      • Weapons
      • AmmoCard
Parameters:
tile - to display info of
offsetX - to avoid overwriting in horizontal
offsetY - to avoid overwriting in vertical
